Imodi yokuba kude nesikrini
Imodi ye-tabletop. Beka idivayisi yakho nembobo yokushaja ngakwesokunxele.
Ukuze ubuyekeze ukuma kwechashazi, cindezela iminwe engu-%d.

Ukuthumela umbhalo
Ibuyekeza indawo yechashazi. Okokuqala, masirekhode amachashazi ku-%s yakho.
Thinta futhi ubambe isikrini ngeminwe emi-3 emaphakathi ye-%s yakho.
Thinta futhi ubambe isikrini ngeminwe emi-4 yokugcina ye-%s yakho.
Ukuma kwechashazi kubuyekeziwe
Zonke izindawo zamachashazi zibuyekeziwe
Ukuma okubuyekeziwe kwamachashazi 1, 2, no-3. Ngokulandelayo, masirekhode amachashazi ku-%s yakho.
Ukuma okubuyekeziwe kwamachashazi 1, 2, 3, no-7. Ngokulandelayo, masirekhode amachashazi ku-%s yakho.
Ayikwazanga ukubuyekeza ukuma kwechashazi.
Thinta uphinde ubambe isikrini ngeminwe engu-%d. Bese uzame futhi.

Ikhibhodi ye-braille
Setha ikhibhodi ye-braille
Indlela yokusebenzisa ikhibhodi ye-braille

Ukusebenzisa ikhibhodi ye-braille, vula ikhibhodi yakho evamile, bese uthepha isithonjana esithi khetha ikhibhodi%1$s (ngokuvamile siba kwikhona elingezansi ngakwesokudla). Khetha \"%2$s.\"

Uma ungayiboni inketho yokushintsha amakhibhodi, zama ukufaka %3$s, ikhibhodi ye-Google.

1. Thepha \"Amasethingi\" ngezansi. Esikrinini esilandelayo, vula i-\"%1$s.\"

2. Vula ikhibhodi yakho evamile, bese uthepha ushintsho lwendlela yokufaka %2$s (ngokuvamile isekhoneni elingezansi kwesokudla).

3. Khetha i-\"%1$s.\"

Uma ungayiboni inketho yokushintsha amakhibhodi, zama ukufaka %3$s, ikhibhodi ye-Google.

1. Vula ikhibhodi ye-braille ngezansi.

2. Vula ikhibhodi yakho evamile, bese uthepha ushintsho lwendlela yokufaka %2$s (ngokuvamile isekhoneni elingezansi kwesokudla).

3. Khetha i-\"%1$s.\"

Uma ungakwazi ukushintsha amakhibhodi, zama ukufaka %3$s, ikhibhodi ye-Google.

Ukuze ususe igama, swayiphela ngakwesokunxele ngeminwe engu-2

Ukunyakaza kwe-cursor

Ungashintsha i-granularity ukuze i-cursor yakho ihambe ngohlamvu, igama, noma ulayini. Noma lawula indlela i-cursor yakho ehamba ngayo ngochungechunge lweminyakazo yomzimba oluhlanganisa amachashazi we-braille.
Hambisa ngohlamvu, igama, noma ulayini

Ukuhlola ukupela
Thola amagama apelwe kabi, hlola ukusikisela, futhi uqinisekise ushintsho
Uma uthayipha noma ulungisa okubhaliwe, sebenzisa iminwe engu-3 ukuze uswayiphele kwesobunxele noma kwesokudla uze uzwe okuthi \"ukuhlola ukupela\"

Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo phambili, swayiphela phansi

Ukuthumela umbhalo, swayiphela phezulu ngeminwe emi-2
Ukuthola usizo nokunye okukhethwa kukho, swayiphela phezulu ngeminwe emi-3

I-granularity
Ukuhlela
Hambisa kuhlamvu oludlule: Bamba ichashazi 6, bese uswayiphela phezulu noma yikuphi ngomunye umunwe
Hambisa kuhlamvu olulandelayo: Bamba ichashazi 6, bese uswayiphela phansi noma yikuphi ngomunye umunwe
Hambisa egameni langaphambilini: Bamba ichashazi 5, bese uswayiphela phezulu noma yikuphi ngomunye umunwe
Hambisa egameni elilandelayo: Bamba ichashazi 5, bese uswayiphela phansi noma yikuphi ngomunye umunwe
Hambisa emgqeni odlule: Bamba ichashazi 4, bese uswayiphela phezulu noma yikuphi ngomunye umunwe
Hambisa kulayini olandelayo: Bamba ichashazi 4, bese uswayiphela phansi noma yikuphi ngomunye umunwe
Hambisa ekuqaleni: Bamba amachashazi 4 no-5, bese uswayiphela phezulu noma yikuphi ngomunye umunwe
Iya ekugcineni: Bamba amachashazi 4 no-5, bese uswayiphela phansi noma yikuphi ngomunye umunwe
Shintshela ku-granularity edlule: Swayiphela kwesokunxele ngeminwe emi-3
Shintshela ku-granularity elandelayo: Swayiphela kwesokudla ngeminwe emi-3
Iya entweni eyandulele: Swayiphela phezulu
Iya entweni elandelayo: Swayiphela phansi
Khetha uhlamvu oludlule: Bamba ichashazi 6, bese uswayiphela phezulu noma yikuphi ngeminwe emi-2
Khetha uhlamvu olulandelayo: Bamba ichashazi 6, bese uswayiphela phansi noma yikuphi ngeminwe emi-2
Khetha igama langaphambilini: Bamba ichashazi 5, bese uswayiphela phezulu noma yikuphi ngeminwe emi-2
Khetha igama elilandelayo: Bamba ichashazi 5, bese uswayiphela phansi noma yikuphi ngeminwe emi-2
Khetha ulayini odlule: Bamba ichashazi 4, bese uswayiphela phezulu noma yikuphi ngeminwe emi-2
Khetha ulayini olandelayo: Bamba ichashazi 4, bese uswayiphela phansi noma yikuphi ngeminwe emi-2
Khetha konke: Bamba ichashazi 4, bese uswayiphela kwesokunxele noma yikuphi ngeminwe emi-3
Kopisha umbhalo: Bamba ichashazi 4, bese uswayiphela phansi noma yikuphi ngeminwe emi-3
Sika umbhalo: Bamba ichashazi 4, bese uswayiphela phezulu noma yikuphi ngeminwe emi-3
Namathisela: Bamba ichashazi 4, bese uswayipha noma yikuphi ngeminwe emi-3
Iya egameni elipelwe kabi elandulele: Swayiphela phezulu
Iya egameni elipelwe kabi elilandelayo: Swayiphela phansi
Izwa iziphakamiso zangaphambili zesipelingi: Swayipha uye kwesokunxele
Izwa isiphakamiso esilandelayo sesipelingi: Swayipha uye kwesokudla
Qinisekisa ukusikisela kokupela: Swayiphela kwesokudla ngeminwe engu-2
Hlehlisa ukusikisela kokupela: Swayiphela kwesobunxele ngeminwe engu-2
Idivayisi yakho ayisekeli ikhibhodi ye-braille
Idivayisi yakho ayisekeli amaphoyinti wokuthinta anele. Ukuthola ulwazi olwengeziwe, xhumana nomkhiqizi wedivayisi yakho
Vula i-TalkBack ukusebenzisa ikhibhodi ye-braille
Vula izilungiselelo zokufinyeleleka
Qhubeka ne-TalkBack ukuze usebenzise ikhibhothi ye-braille
Uma i-TalkBack ivuliwe, ungathepha isikrini sakho ukuze ufake amasimbuli e-braille.
Ikhibhodi elandelayo
Okokufundisa kwekhibhodi ye-braille

Ngekhibhodi ye-braille, ungathepha isikrini sakho ukuze ufake i-braille yamachashazi ayi-6.

Awusebenzisi i-Unified English Braille. Ukuze ushintshe ulimi lwakho lokuthayipha, iya kumasethingi e-TalkBack.

Ukuze uthayiphe i-braille, kudingeka ubambe futhi usebenzise ifoni yakho ngokwehlukile.
Okulandelayo
Shiya ikhibhodi ye-braille
Ngeke ukwazi ukusebenzisa ukuthinta kwe-TalkBack okuvamile kwikhibhodi ye-braille.\n\nUkuze uqalise, asisethe ukuma kwamachashazi we-braille ayi-6 lapho uthayipha.
Kusuka manje, ngeke ukwazi ukusebenzisa ukuthinta okuvamile kwe-TalkBack. I-TalkBack ayitholakali lapho usebenzisa ikhibhodi ye-braille.
Ukuqala, bamba ifoni yakho ngale ndlela, isikrini sibheke kude nawe.
Thepha kabili noma yikuphi ukuqhubeka
Thepha ichashazi 1 ngomunwe wakho wenkomba ongakwesokunxele ukuthayipha uhlamvu \"A\"
Okulandelayo, zama ukuthayipha amaletha athi B, C, no-D
Ukususa iletha, swayipha ngakwesokunxele
Ukwengeza isikhala, swayipha ngakwesokudla
Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo emuva, swayiphela phezulu
Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo phambili, swayiphela phansi
Ukufihla ikhibhodi, swayipha ngenzansi ngeminwe engu-2
Ukushintshela kwenye ikhibhodi yakho, swayipha ngenzansi ngeminwe engu-3
Ukuqeda okokufundisa, swayipha phezulu ngeminwe engu-3
SUSA
ISIKHALA
I-CURSOR IHANJISWE EMUVA
I-CURSOR IHANJISWE PHAMBILI
FIHLA IKHIBHODI
IKHIBHODI ELANDELAYO
Kusukela manje, ngeke ukwazi ukusebenzisa ukuthinta okuvamile kwe-TalkBack. I-TalkBack ayitholakali uma usebenzisa ikhibhodi ye-braille.\n\n%1$s

Okokuqala, jikisa ifoni yakho ukuze isikrini sibheke kude nawe.
\Okulandelayo, zungezisa ifoni ngokuvundlile ukuze ibe ukuma okundlaleke ngobubanzi. Izandla zakho kufanele zibambe amaphethelo amafushane wefoni. Isandla sakho sokudla kufanele sibambe ekugcineni ngembobo ye-USB. Phumuza iminwe yakho engaphakathi engu-3 kusikrini, futhi usebenzise ucikicane nesithupha sakho ukusekela ifoni.

Lapho usukulungele, thepha kabili kusikrini ukuze uqhubeke.

Ukuphuma kukhibhodi ye-braille, swayipha ngenzansi kuya phansi ngeminwe engu-3. Lokhu kushintshela kwikhibhodi yakho evamile.

Ifoni yakho iqondile. Ukuze uqhubeke, zungezisa ifoni yakho ivundle ukuze uhlangothi olude lube ngenzansi. Lokhu kujikisa isikrini ukuze singabheki ngakuwe. Lapho usukulungele, thepha kabili isikrini ukuze uqhubeke.

Gcina isikrini sibheke kude nawe. Bamba ifoni yakho ngazo zombili izandla, kunqenqema olufushane lwefoni, ukuze iminwe engu-3 emaphakathi yesandla ngasinye ikwazi ukuthinta isikrini.\n\nUmunwe wakho oyinkomba ongakwesokunxele kufanele ube echashazini 1. Manje, thepha ichashazi 1 ukuthayipha iletha “A”.
Thepha ichashazi 1 ngomunwe wakho oyinkomba ongakwesokunxele ukuthayipha “A”
Thepha %1$s ukuthayipha iletha %2$s
Ukususa iletha, swayipha ngakwesokunxele. Izame manje.
d isusiwe.
Ukwengeza isikhala, swayipha ngakwesokudla Izame manje.
Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo emuva, swayiphela phezulu Izame manje.
Ukuze uhambise i-cursor yombhalo phambili, swayiphela phansi Izame manje.
Ukufihla ikhibhodi, swayipha ngenzansi ngeminwe engu-2. Izame manje.
Fihla ikhibhodi. Ngokuvamile, lokhu kufihla ikhibhodi. Ikhibhodi ye-braille izohlala ivuliwe ngoba usephakathi nokokufundisa.
Ukushintshela kwenye ikhibhodi yakho, swayipha ngenzansi ngeminwe engu-3. Izame manje.
Ikhibhodi elandelayo. Ngokuvamile, lokhu kushintshela kwibhodi elandelayo. Manje, uzohlala kukhibhodi ye-braille ngoba usephakathi nokokufundisa.
Ungase futhi uthayiphe kumodi ye-tabletop ngokubeka ifoni yakho phansi etafuleni. Ukuze uqedele okokufundisa, swayipha phezulu ngeminwe emi-3, bese uthola inketho yokokufundisa yokuqedela

Imenyu yezinketho ivuliwe. Jikisa ifoni yakho ibeke ngakuwe bese uyibamba ngendlela evamile. Manje usungakwazi ukusebenzisa ukuthinta kwe-TalkBack ukuzulazula. Swayiphela ngakwesokudla ukuze ubone okunye okungakhethwa.
%s\nBeka phansi idivayisi yakho etafuleni. Bese, uthinta uphinde ubambe isikrini ngeminwe emi-3 engaphakathi yesandla ngasinye ngokuma okhululeke ukuthayipha ngakho.
Beka phansi idivayisi yakho etafuleni. Bese, uthinta uphinde ubambe isikrini ngeminwe emi-3 engaphakathi yesandla ngasinye ngokuma okhululeke ukuthayipha ngakho.
Ibonisa ikhibhodi ye-braille. Jikisa ifoni yakho ukuze isikrini sibheke kude nawe. Zungezisa ifoni ngokuvundlile ngokuma kokwakheka kwezwe. Bese uqala ukuthayipha.
Fihla ikhibhodi
Shintsha ikhibhodi
Thumela umbhalo
Isikhala
Umugqa omusha wengeziwe
Iletha isusiwe
Igama lisusiwe
Asiqhubeke nokokufundisa. %1$s
Ishintshela kusikrini esithintwayo se-braille

Isibonisi sangaphandle se-braille sixhunyiwe, ongasisebenzisa ukuze uthayiphe umbhalo kufoni yakho.\n\nUngaphinde ushintshele kukhibhodi ye-braille yesikrini esithintwayo noma indlela yokufaka elandelayo.
Shintshela kusikrini esithintwayo se-braille
Shintshela endleleni yokufaka elandelayo
